name: Home - Introduction
headline: Hi, I’m Alexis. Nice to meet you.
text:
I’m a front-end web developer currently living in my hometown of San Francisco, CA. I’ve been playing with the web since 1996, and have worked professionally in the web industry for 10 years. I’ve developed sites for a variety of companies and organizations—large and small—and now am focusing on building and architecting component libraries, front-end UI systems, and writing modern, standards-based code.

Tim Berners-Lee proposed the idea of the World Wide Web on my 6th birthday, so I like to think it was meant to be.
